## RuneTree class

A representation of an in-game rune tree

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RuneTree 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, data)](./shieldbow.runetree._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>RuneTree</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [icon](./shieldbow.runetree.icon.md) |  | string | A link to the rune tree's icon. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.runetree.id.md) |  | number | The unique numerical ID of this Rune Tree. |
|  [key](./shieldbow.runetree.key.md) |  | string | The key of this rune tree. Usually the same as the rune's name. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.runetree.name.md) |  | string | The name of this rune tree. |
|  [slots](./shieldbow.runetree.slots.md) |  | Collection&lt;number, Collection&lt;number, [Rune](./shieldbow.rune.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt; | The slots of this rune tree. The slots are numbered from 1 to 4. The first slot contains the keystones. |
